00024 class FeatureIndex {
00025  protected:
00026   std::vector<int>     feature_;
00027   ChunkFreeList<int>   feature_freelist_;
00028   ChunkFreeList<char>  char_freelist_;
00029   std::vector<const char*>   unigram_templs_;

00037   virtual int id(const char *) = 0;
00038   const char* getIndex(char **, char **, size_t);
00039   bool openTemplate(const Param &);
00040 
00041  public:
00042   virtual bool open(const Param &) = 0;
00043   virtual void clear() = 0;
00044   virtual void close() = 0;
00045   virtual bool buildFeature(LearnerPath *path) = 0;
00046 
00047   void set_alpha(const double *);
00048 
00049   size_t size() const { return maxid_; }
00050 
00051   bool buildUnigramFeature(LearnerPath *, const char*);
00052   bool buildBigramFeature(LearnerPath *, const char *, const char*);
00053 
00054   void calcCost(LearnerPath *path);

00056 
00057   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00058 
00059   const char *strdup(const char *str);
00060 
00061   static bool convert(const char *text_filename,
00062                       const char *binary_filename);
00063 
00064   explicit FeatureIndex(): feature_freelist_(8192 * 32),
00065                            char_freelist_(8192 * 32),
00066                            maxid_(0), alpha_(0) {}
00067   virtual ~FeatureIndex() {}
00068 };
